Introduction
This resource is the observation section Mammography Associated Features.
This profile contains references to multiple sub-observation pieces of this observation..
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of how and where Mammography Associated Features is referenced,and what items Mammography Associated Features itself references.
Review Status
NotReviewed
Member Observations The following are fields of this observation that are stored in seperate observation resources. Each reference is stored as an item in the Observation.hasMember element.

'Mammography Nipple Retraction' reference
'Mammography Skin Thickening' reference
'Mammography Axillary Adenopathy' reference
